pages.text: The $(marked)Sculptor Rite$() is a common practice among $(ml:bestiary/serfs)Yellow Serfs$(), allowing them to fabricate idols of $(ml:goo/hastur)Hastur$(). This process also serves as initiation by giving its product to a $(ml:bestiary/serfs)Yellow Vassal$().
This rite will require the majority of your energy, so do not start it at low health.
